entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
